titles.title: Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies Appropriations Act, 2026
An original bill making appropriations for Agriculture, Rural Development, Food and Drug Administration, and Related Agencies for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2026, and for other purposes.

action.text: Committee on Appropriations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Hoeven. With written report No. 119-37.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 112.
